title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 §§ 197-2.12 - Advertisements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 §§ 197-2.12 - Advertisements

State Regulations

Any education institution or other organization offering
approved courses may not make or publish any false or misleading statement
regarding employment opportunities which may be available as a result of the
successful completions of a course or as a result of acquisition of a home
inspector license. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
§§
197-2.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
